Sure, confirming we have update the email address to hello@ now. 

We have also removed Valet parking. 

Regarding Instagram, can you please send me your logins, I need to resync it with the site.

Thanks heaps

Hi Rula, 

Ok cool, we have now set this up. 

The customers will head to the same live page:
https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings/

When you receive the request,  you can check availability and if all is good, you can send them to this link to pay and confirm their choices:
https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings-payment/

Please test and let me know if you have any changes?

Ahh sorry i completely missed it. Great perfect.

Yes that sounds great.

Hi Rula, 

Regarding the attachment, we actually changed the wording so that they click to receive the pdf file (please have a look at the one you would have received). Adding attachments increases the chances of the emails going to spam. 

Regarding approving before payment. This can be done. How about we remove the payment section of the group booking form. Then when you approve the date, you can send them to a hidden booking form with less fields, just their name, email, event date/time and then credit card info. Would that work for you?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

I tried it from my personal.

Also please let me know if this is possible.

I also wanted to ask if we can approve the group bookings before it is confirmed. As we are having multiply come in and the space is not available. Also, a receipt or confirmation that the payment has gone through.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Health,

Hope you are well.

As discussed, I need to have an automatic reply sent to those that send an event enquiry for Firepit not the group bookings. Please see the attachment & reply below.

I also wanted to ask if we can approve the group bookings before it is confirmed. As we are having multiply come in and the space is not available. Also, a receipt or confirmation that the payment has gone through.

Thanks
Rula



Hi,

Thank you for your recent enquiry for the event rooms in Firepit, we would love to help you celebrate your event.

You would be looking at a minimum spend which will give you exclusive hire of the space three hours (lunch)/ four hours (dinner) duration.

Please note that we are currently do not hold tentative bookings on the space, a 25% deposit of the minimum spend is required to secure your booking.

Our timings are either a 11:00am, 11:30am or 12:00pm start time for lunch and 5:00pm, 5:30pm or 6:00pm start time for dinner.

I have attached our current menus for you to view for both food and beverage options, let me know what you think?

Check out some images to give you an idea of our space which I feel would be ideal for your special day based on your numbers.

If you are after casual dining this is not a private space or a serviced area.

Please head over to our website and click group bookings. https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings/
Group Bookings - The Paper Mill Food
Ideal for those that don't require a private space and want something a little more casual for their gathering or celebration.
thepapermillfood.com

If you have any questions, let me know.

I look forward to helping you with your plans,

Warm regards,


EVENTS TEAM



20 SHEPHERD STREET,
LIVERPOOL NSW 2170

T. +61 2 8742 4033

W. WWW.THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM

E. EVENTS@THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM
